Commands.Fulminating Darkness: 2-HIT AoE melee BRV+HP attack  HP damage dealt is split amongst all enemies  Converts 10% of HP damage dealt to BRV  Casts 「Target Lock」 on all enemies for 2 turns  Grants 「Kingdom's Shield」 and 「HP Damage Reduction」 for 3 turns   「Kingdom's Shield」 has the following effects:  - Lowers BRV damage taken  - Directs AoE HP damage to self  ※If an ally grants 「Kingdom's Shield」 to self, previously granted 「Kingdom's Shield」 is canceled
Commands.Ruin Impendent: 2-HIT melee BRV+HP Attack  Moderately restores HP based on HP damage Dealt, up to 10% of Max HP  Grants 「Knight's Mettle」 for 3 turns   「Knight's Mettle」 raises own Max BRV and Attack
Commands.HP Heal Attack Up: Slightly restores HP  Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Flame Purge: 4-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  Grants 「Dalmasca's Brave General」 for 3 turns   While HP is above 50%:  - Turns into 「Flame Purge+」  　∟ 6-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  　∟ BRV stolen can overflow up to 200% Max BRV   「Dalmasca's Brave General」 raises party Max BRV and Attack

Passives.Fulminating Darkness Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Fulminating Darkness
Passives.Unwavering Loyalty: While  Kingdom's Shield  is active:- Prevents KO if HP is at least 50% of Max HP and leaves HP value at 1
Passives.Ruin Impendent Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Ruin Impendent
Passives.HP Damage BRV Gain: Slightly raises BRV after taking HP damage
Passives.Buff Attack Speed: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while buffed
Passives.Fulminating Darkness Extend: When using  Fulminating Darkness :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 5- Moderately raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on HP damage dealt
Passives.Buff Attack Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Ruin Impendent Extend: When using  Ruin Impendent :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 4- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRVWhile  Knight's Mettle  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+    Raises BRV based on Attack   Increases the number of BRV hits to 2   Slightly raises total BRV potency- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+    Melee BRV+HP Attack   BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV   Slightly restores HP based on HP damage dealt, up to 10% of Max HP
Passives.Resonance of Life and Power: Raises party HP and Attack by 10%
Passives.HP Heal Attack Up Extend: When using  HP Heal Attack Up :- Slightly increases the amount of HP restored- Slightly improves  Attack Up  effect

Weapons.Lohengrin CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Flame Purge
Weapons.Blood Sword CP: 35: When using  Ruin Impendent :- Raises BRV potency- Moderately raises critical BRV damage dealt- Raises the HP recovery limit- Converts excess HP recovered to BRV- Improves the effects of  Knight's Mettle  and extends its duration
Weapons.Mythril Blade CP: 15: When using  Fulminating Darkness :- Raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Extends the duration of  Target Lock - Improves BRV damage reduction effect of  Kingdom's Shield  and extends its duration- Improves  HP Damage Reduction  and extends its duration
